codeList:
# new-values.yaml
minio:
  resources:
     limits:
       cpu: 2
       memory: 8Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yam;
minio:
  zones: 2
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
kafka:
  resources:
     limits:
        cpu: 2
        memory: 12Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
kafka:
  replicaCount: 4
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  broker:
    resources:
       limits:
         cpu: 4
         memory: 16Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    resources:
       limits:
         cpu: 4
         memory: 16Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    volumes:
      journal:
        size: 20Gi
        storageClassName: gp3
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  broker:
    replicaCount: 3
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
pulsar:
  bookkeeper:
    replicaCount: 3
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
etcd:
  resources:
     limits:
       cpu: 2
       memory: 8Gi
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus
# new-values.yaml
etcd:
  replicaCount: 5
helm upgrade <milvus-release> --reuse-values -f new-values.yaml milvus/milvus

anchorList.label: 擴充 Milvus 的相依性
新增額外的 Kafka 代理商池（建議）
增加每個 Pulsar 代理 pod 的資源
增加每個 Pulsar 莊家 pod 的資源
